room_title: Escape room "The Half Treasure Map" by 8D Room Escape & Board Games in Boston
review: I ordered online a booking for two people and when I arrived at the location the place was closed. I called multiple times over the past few days, have sent emails, social media messages and no responses. I have a $56 charge on my account for something I didnâ€™t even get to experience.  Poor form.

room_title: Escape room "The Half Treasure Map" by 8D Room Escape & Board Games in Boston
review: Had a date night with my wife and we had a great time. Full of fun moments and the staff was helpful and nice. Definitely going back to try and beat the other rooms. Cant wait to see our picture.

room_title: Escape room "The Half Treasure Map" by 8D Room Escape & Board Games in Boston
review: Had a great time at this place. We selected the hardest room they have for now.  Puzzles were very interesting and challenging, very impressive. Cant wait to visit them and try other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Half Treasure Map" by 8D Room Escape & Board Games in Boston
review: Had a great time at this escape room! The room was interesting and the puzzles were challenging but doable! The owner and employees were all very friendly. Really cool place! Can't wait to do the next challenge!
